Description:
Ready, Set, Go!
This solid brick veneer is situated in a great location in Kangaroo Flat and is set on a generous 749m2 allotment. The property offers comfortable, renovated living for the owner-occupier, or a sound investment opportunity - ready when you are!!!
This renovated home consists of three bedrooms all with built in robes, central three piece bathroom, and modern kitchen with updated gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher and breakfast bar. The downlights, quality carpets and vinyl plank flooring gives this home a modern feel throughout.
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling provide comfort all year round with assistance of a spilt system, gas wall heater and awnings during the summer months.
The landscaped front yard is as low maintenance as the house, with twin carport for your cars, caravan, trailer or boat.
Secure double gates gives access to an inviting backyard under established shade trees and a decked alfresco area that is perfect for summer entertaining. The garden shed and rainwater tank complete what is an all year round outdoor area.
Close to the prestigious Sandhurst Crest Estate, schools, Clubs, Lansell Square, indoor pool and sporting facilities the list is endless.
First timers, retirees, and investors you'll be excited by this little beauty. It's the perfect fit so be quick, it won't last long.
Insights: 115 Alder Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Extremely desirable family home in a great location
- Outstanding family home (Built 2010) with all the added features that present a quality home
- Master brm with large walk in robe and ensuite, all large brms with fitted robes and tv outlets
- Modern kitchen with ample drawers, induction cooking, dishwasher and electric wall oven. Ducted vacuum, caesar stone bench
- Separate lounge with home theatre that stays with the home
- Extensive storage throughout the home including linen space
- Double garage, water tank with pump, 12'x 20'workshop with power
- Ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling for all seasons
- Lovely undercover entertainment area caravan etc
- Close to Big Hill Primary, walk to KMart, only one hour to Melbourne airport
This very nice designed home is 10 years young and is a beautiful spacious family home on a 700m2 allotment. This charming residence includes a generous lounge and a large open plan kitchen/meals/family room.

Description:
GRAND CALIFORNIAN BUNGALOW OFFERS LARGE GARDEN, STUDIO AND GREAT CAR ACCOMMODATION
This outstanding 1930s era home combines all the early Art Deco hallmarks and offers a beautiful grandeur with large light rooms, decorative ceilings and windows, and modern appointed kitchen and bathroom rooms.
The home comprises a large verandah-balcony with entry via double doors, 4 generous double bedrooms (3 with robes), and 3 gorgeous living areas including a formal lounge with wood fire, huge dining room with large kitchen, and a large family living room that opens to an alfresco outdoor entertaining space. There is picture railing, period lighting, polished timber floors, ducted gas heating and quality fittings throughout.
Detached from the home is a studio-flat that offers an expansive living area, verandah, bedroom, bathroom and kitchen - perfect for an Air B & B.
The grounds feature many original shade trees, lawns, a gym room, and separate covered entertaining garden room.
Garaging and vehicle space comprises:
- 2 car carport
- 4 car garage
- workshop
- semi circular pavement driveway.
Positioned on over 3000m2 of garden (in 3 titles), this special and versatile character home is just 800m from the Train Station, and 500m from shopping and schools.
Inspect by private appointment.
Internal area
339m²

Description:
PICTURE PERFECT CONTEMPORARY COTTAGE
Set back from the road in a quiet street, this beautifully presented property is an easy walk to bus stops, playground, primary and secondary schools and close to the supermarket, banks, chemist and other amenities of Kangaroo Flat. Despite being a contemporary build, the home offers a number of character features that offer an abundance of charm and appeal.
A rose arbour borders a formal entry, which opens into an open plan kitchen and dining room. This lovely room is filled with natural light and details such as the Belfast sink, country-style cabinetry, walk-in pantry and large oven provide a modern-farmhouse feel. A study nook to one side provides added practicality and an archway leads through to a large open plan lounge and formal dining space. Behind the kitchen is secure access to the garage, a powder room, laundry and access to the rear yard. Downstairs also features a good-sized master bedroom with an ensuite, walk-in robe and built-in robe.
Upstairs, the landing provides a large second living space. Off this area are three bedrooms, all with ceiling fans and built-in robes. A light-filled family bathroom features a freestanding, clawfoot bathtub and a separate toilet completes the upstairs area.
Outdoors, a decked alfresco area is perfect for year-round entertaining and steps lead down to a fully-fenced outdoor spa and a sunny terraced area surrounded by established garden. A double shed separate to the house provides extra vehicle storage and space for a workshop.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling
Gas log fire
Modern kitchen appliances including five-burner gas cooktop, 900mm oven and dishwasher
Ample storage throughout
Interconnecting doors throughout offering excellent zoning
Access to the rear yard from both sides of the house
This delightful property is as practical as it is charming. With plenty of living space, an attractive garden, additional shedding and character details, this quality build is perfect for a buyer seeking a home they can move straight into and enjoy.

Description:
A GREAT UNIT TO INVEST IN OR RETIRE TO
Just a level 1km walk from the shopping hub of Kangaroo Flat, this quietly positioned Brick home is set on a level garden allotment with space to move.
The brick unit offers 2 bedrooms with robes, an entry hall, open plan living with gas heating and an air conditioner, gas kitchen, separate toilet and bathroom, laundry with garden access via a porch and verandah.
There is a single lock up garage with adjoining covered area, pavement driveway and a quiet neighborhood of units that surround.
Potential rental yield of $265.00pw make this a 5% plus investment at an affordable price.
Internal area
75.5m²

Description:
ATTENTION FIRST HOME BUYERS AND INVESTORS!
Located within strolling distance to Gurri Wanyarra fitness centre and a short drive to St Monicas primary school, this well-built 1950's weather board home is a first home buyers delight.
It comprises light filled three-bedrooms , a central bathroom with separate shower and bath. There is an open plan dining and kitchen with masses of storage and gas cooking. In addition, there is a wall air conditioning with ceiling fans to the lounge room, water tanks and a large outside entertaining areas.
Situated on a 679m2 corner block this home has plenty of outdoor storage

Description:
A family home you'll fall in love with!
A superb property for family living you'll fall in love with.
At the top of Browning St with beautiful views across the treetops over Golden Square through to the Cathedral.
With fantastic street appeal, beyond the immaculately kept front garden, this fully rendered family home will impress.
A split level home with an inspiring floor plan creating lovely and interesting light filled living spaces.
The first of two living areas has gorgeous polished timber flooring and is currently used as the main lounge.
Off the lounge and down a level is the dining area.
Windows either side allow the light to flood in and the 10' ceilings amplify the feeling of spaciousness.
The hub of the home, the kitchen, is conveniently positioned, central to all of the living spaces, and comes with a walk in pantry, wall oven, a stainless steel gas cooktop and dishwasher.
The master bedroom has an impressive huge walk in robe and fantastic ensuite comprising of double shower, toilet, vanity and a spa bath with surrounding windows that take advantage of the views.
Another smart feature of the property is the main bathroom.
It's conveniently located for both bedrooms but is also a walk through, making it almost like an ensuite for the 3rd bedroom.
Both of these bedrooms have built in robes and easily accommodate queen size beds.
Off the dining area is the decked alfresco.
If you haven't fallen in love with the house by now, this is where it will happen.
A beautiful place to spend time in the warmer weather entertaining or relaxing.
The fully landscaped, terraced, backyard is absolutely delightful with low maintenance established gardens and espaliered fruit trees.
Ornamental pear trees not only partially shade the back yard but also separate it from the outstanding salt chlorinated, in ground, solar heated pool.
In the summer, all your time will be spent here.
In love yet!
Inside Features:
Large main bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite
2 other bedrooms with built-in robes
Two separate living areas
Open plan kitchen
Ducted gas heating
Ducted evaporative cooling
Outside Features:
Large double carport
Manicured terraced mature gardens
Large deck for entertaining
2 Storage rooms
Solar heated salt water pool
A beautifully presented home in a quiet location still within close proximity to schools, recreational facilities and all conveniences.
Insights: 48 Browning Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Better than new. Beautiful family home
CURRENT BID $380,000 - 3 Qualified Buyers
The property has not met reserve yet. The Openn Negotiation (An Online Auction that allows flexible terms/conditions) is underway and the property can sell as early as tomorrow.
Contact Danny Crowle from Bendigo Property Plus immediately to become qualified and avoid disappointment.
With an attractive street presence and a quiet convenient location, this beautiful 10 year old GJ Gardner built home is sure to attract a lot of attention.
The modern, three-bedroom family home is immaculately presented and not only boasts a versatile floor plan, but also delivers on several other appealing features including:
- A stylish kitchen equipped with an island bench, plenty of bench space, a wall pantry, an economic two-drawer dishwasher, electric cook top and an electric wall oven.
- Ideal for comfortable family living, the light filled open plan space shared by the kitchen, dining and living has great views of the established garden and green backyard.
- The main bedroom comes with walk-in robe and ensuite. Bedrooms two and three easily accommodate a queen size ensemble and both have built-in robes.
- The main bathroom is conveniently located close to bedrooms two and three and the main living area of the home.
- A versatile floor plan provides the option of either a second living area, study or fourth bedroom.
- Heating and cooling are well and truly taken care of. Three reverse cycle split system units have it all covered. Theres one in the main living area, another in the main bedroom and the third in bedroom three.
- A paved outdoor area is the perfect spot for relaxing or entertaining.
- Crimsafe steel mesh security doors and window screens provide a bit of extra security and piece of mind.
- The fully fenced backyard is safe for both kids and pets. In total, the fully landscaped allotment is approximately 691m2.
- A double garage with remote access also has a manual roller at the rear to allow for vehicle access to the backyard.
On the Melbourne side of Bendigo, less than a 10-minute drive to central Bendigo, within walking distance to Kangaroo Flat CBD and Lansell Square Shopping Centre. Close to schools, child care and medical facilities as well as public transport.

Description:
Stylish townhouse in great location
- Perfect townhouse (Built 2017) in a central location for retirees or the individual
- Offering one bedroom plus study and open plan living
- Split system for all heating and cooling needs
- Great design, spacious living area, court yard overlooking reserve
- Master bedroom with excellent storage, floor to ceiling robes
- Vacant possession is available now but for the investor rental is approx $260pw
- Induction cooking, classy splashback, pantry, security door, square set plastering, euro laundry
- Very central location close to aquatic centre, shops, public transport
- Lovely galley style kitchen with caesar stone bench tops, Linen cupboard
- Yes an almost new affordable townhouse at a price that make this home a must see
This lovely townhouse is only two years of age and is in excellent condition. Originally when the townhouses were built this townhouset was the pick of the bunch (6) and remains so due to space and land size. These lovely townhouses are now proving to be highly sought after due to the quality of the build and the central location.

Description:
Perfect Home or Investment Property in an Ideal Location
Have you been looking for that perfect home or investment property in an ideal location, within walking distance of all the amenities in Kangaroo Flat?
This solidly built 3-bedroom, much loved, one owner home sits in a quiet, established street in the heart of Kangaroo Flat.
Offering 3 bedrooms, the main is huge with enough room for a king bed and even a sitting area, with wall to wall built-in robes.
The other 2 also have built-ins, with the large 3 piece bathroom servicing all the rooms, with a new corner shower and even a spa bath to relax in.
The large formal lounge flows into the open kitchen and dining, where the lovely open, easy-use kitchen has a gas cooker, wall oven and large breakfast bar.
Enjoy all the comforts of hot and cold weather with a newly installed, reverse-cycle air-conditioner throughout the home.
Also throughout the home are extra features such as wide hallways designed for wheelchair access and electric shutters on lounge and main bedroom.
Side access, double lock-up garage with electric door and rain water tank.
Close to public transport, schools, shopping, an easy commute to Melbourne, and so much more.
This home is a must see.

Description:
THE COMPLETE PACKAGE!
When it comes to neat, tidy and affordable packages, this property is a real standout! Situated in a quiet court and set on a private and secure 1176m2 (approx.) allotment, the superbly renovated family home represents excellent value for money and is ready to move in and enjoy immediately. Add to this a terrific location that is convenient to schools for all ages and all the local amenities, and you have a highly sought after proposition for any quality home seeker to be excited about!
The home is much bigger than you expect from the front! Boasting a flexible floor plan that is fit for a family or intimate enough for a couple, presentation is immaculate and recent renovations ensure that there is nothing left for you to do here! Featuring four generous sized bedrooms, all have built in robes and ceiling fans, whilst the master bedroom has its own three piece ensuite. One of the bedrooms was originally a rumpus room, and can still be utilised as a second living space if you don't require a fourth! The main bathroom is cleverly configured with a separate shower room and toilet, whilst also interconnecting with the good sized laundry. The spacious main living area has loads of room to spread out, and boasts gas log fire and ceiling fan, as well as ducted air conditioning that also flows to all parts of the home. A large dining space occupies the area at the rear, ensuring larger family gatherings are catered for! Completing the floor plan at the front is the fabulous brand new quality kitchen, a delight for the household chef! Featuring an abundance of new cabinetry and bench space in neutral tones, breakfast bar/casual meals area, all new appliances inc 900mm oven and cook top plus integrated dishwasher, loads of storage, and quality tiles underfoot.
Outside, the large secure allotment will cater for kids, pets and gardening enthusiasts alike, with room for everyone to share the loads of space provided! Lovers of outdoor living and entertaining will be absolutely thrilled at what's on offer, thanks to the huge undercover area that can be utilised all year round. Brilliant for relaxing or entertaining family or friends, it's a real feature of the property and a bonus given Australia's love of living outdoors! There is a double carport at the front, with access through to a large tradesman's shed with concrete floor and power.
This fabulous package will suit any number of home seekers, from families, retirees or first home buyers alike! With the property market running red hot at the moment, you'd better act quickly on this one to avoid disappointment. Call now to inspect

Description:
Love is all it needs.
Deceiving from the outside, this brick veneer home offers a great opportunity to enter the local market in a good part of town at a very affordable price. Accommodation includes three bedrooms, built-in robes, large separate lounge, kitchen/dining, family/sitting room and two bathrooms.
The updated kitchen includes gas/electric cooking appliances, appliance cupboard, pantry and island bench/breakfast bar with lots of pot drawers. The adjoining dining area features a built-in wall unit complete with glass-fronted cabinets and a spot for the TV.
Off the kitchen/dining is a fully enclosed games/sunroom with rustic timber and ripple iron bar it's the ideal space for entertaining, a pool table or just somewhere to relax. But wait, there's more the double garage has been converted to a 4th bedroom/ teen retreat/home office/hobby area. It boasts a large bedroom/workroom (with external access) and an adjoining room to use as an office/living room etc.
A spacious covered outdoor entertaining area in the secure backyard is ready for your family barbecues and birthday parties with a potbelly heater and attached fernery area.
Well-situated on a low maintenance block approx 645m², it's directly opposite a bus stop and playground/park and close to Lansell Square shops, Crusoe Reservoir and walking tracks through community bush parklands.
With a little TLC and some updating, this gem of a home has loads of potential and is priced to sell promptly.

Description:
Spacious Family Home or investment opportunity
Set in the delightful Byambee Rises Estate we find 21 Jerribong Way. This four-bedroom brick family home within walking distance to Lansell Square Shopping Centre is ideal for raising a family, or a sound investment opportunity with a self-contained unit added on to the home.
House Features include:
Three-bedroom, two bathroom and study or separate living area
Large main bedroom with spacious walk in robe and ensuite having toilet, shower and vanity
Northern facing sunroom and separate undercover outdoor entertaining area perfect for entertaining
Ducted cooling and heating throughout the home
Large kitchen with walk in pantry, dishwasher, four burner gas cooktop and electric oven
Double Garage with automatic roller door, and extra space for shelving if desired
Instant Gas Hot Water System
Self-contained living area features:
Own separate laundry, meals preparation area and clothesline
Own driveway with double gated access
One bedroom with walk in robe, modern bathroom with vanity, toilet and shower
One living area with split system heating/cooling unit
This low maintenance home is a must for your inspection list, dont delay in contacting the Heard & Co. Sales Team to book your private inspection.

Description:
MODERN, PRIVATE & VERY APPEALING!
Located opposite the Kangaroo Flat train station and a short walk across to the local shops, supermarkets and schools is this modern and appealing "as new" quality townhouse that is ideally suited to first home buyers, low maintenance singles/couples and investors alike. With the home sited on its own title and attracting no body corporate fees, this is the ideal easy care lifestyle home that you can lock and leave and not have to worry about a thing!
Providing a value packed alternative to unit living, the property offers your own fully fenced 590m2 allotment, and is private and secure from street level. The building measures in at a sizeable 17.85 squares, and feels like home immediately! In fantastic order throughout and presented to perfection, there really is absolutely nothing to do but move in and enjoy immediately!
The well designed floor plan is configured with three bedrooms, two complete with built in robes. The master has its own walk through robe to an ensuite, whilst the main bathroom (inc separate shower and bath) services the rest of the home. Quality timber look vinyl flooring adorns the high traffic areas throughout, including the well equipped kitchen and adjoining meals area. The kitchen presents in neutral tones and has good cupboard storage, large pantry and boasts quality cooking appliances and dishwasher. The central living area is spacious, and a gas log fire provides a relaxing focal point. Ducted cooling and ceiling fans provide other temperature control. A double automated garage has direct internal access and plenty of storage a feature throughout the home! Outside, the easy care allotment has a lovely covered alfresco for entertaining outdoors and a garden shed for tool storage. The secure yard has been landscaped and there is room for your pets, whilst extra space at the front is yours to do what you like with!
For the owner occupier to live in and love, or a really solid investment in a great location, there is so much more than meets the eye here! You seriously need to be here to truly appreciate it's appeal. Call now to inspect
Internal area
124m²

Located close to Schools, Shopping facilities, transportation and Sports & Recreational Reserves these blocks are a terrific place to build!

Description:
Ready, set, go!
Refurbished and refreshed family home is a beaut budget buy for first home buyers, downsizers or investors. Located in a quiet street, it's handy to all life's necessities whatever the age group.
It features updated bathroom and laundry, fresh paintwork and new day/night blinds throughout.
Light floods the roomy lounge through big windows overlooking the front garden and rear outdoor entertaining area while the kitchen is equipped with gas cooking, dishwasher, good storage including pantry and breakfast bar dividing it from the meals/family area.
The new bathroom is an all-white affair with matching laundry and separate toilet alongside.
Internal temperature is controlled by gas heating and split system air conditioning but you could spend summer outside with a quiet breakfast or a barbecue lunch under the shade covered alfresco area off the meals/family room.
The neat and secure backyard includes a huge workshop (3.8m x 10.5m) with power and concrete floor, plus a caravan/trailer port, 3m x 3m garden shed and double lock-up carport with roller doors and access through to the shed.
